name: 3 Things to Do Right Now for a Longer
short_description: When you’re young, you don’t worry too much about what you do to and put into your body. All wounds heal at a supernatural rate and your metabolism is better than a hummingbird’s, but that doesn’t last for long. Within a few years, your wounds turn into scars and your metabolism is actually something you have to work for. While that doesn’t mean you can’t live a full and happy life, it does mean you have to put in some effort to maintain your health—a priceless thing. Here are some things you should start doing now to maintain a longer life.
